{{Description|"Auspicious beasts leap high to pluck the greens — that symbolizes good fortune and knowing how to make some serious green, y'know — so may we all rise to new heights, one step at a time!"}}
'''Bestial Ascent''' is [[Gaming]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{Talent Note|particles|Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider|2}}
** This particle generation has a '''3''' seconds cooldown.
* Gaming may miss the leap if the target is too low and not in his point-blank range.
* Charmed Cloudstrider can be performed at any height as long as Gaming is still airborne.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|ascension|1|Dance of Amity|character=Gaming|talent=Bestial Ascent}}
* {{Talent Note|ascension|2|Air of Prosperity|character=Gaming|talent=Bestial Ascent}}
